https://tmrev.io/movie/852570-A Life in Words and Music 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Though the MGM Musical "Words and Music" celebrates the brilliant body of work by Richard Rodgers and Lorenz Hart, the studio misrepresented Hart by omitting his excessive drinking and homosexuality as well as Rodgers' crankiness and perfectionism. A Life in Words and Music
